level.heading: Issuer's lien.
level.text: A lien in favor of an issuer upon a certificated security is valid against a purchaser only if the right of the issuer to the lien is noted conspicuously on the security certificate.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-240
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-240, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 28:8-201.
